segments.text: Jacob , are you interested in helping me out and going on a blind date with a friend of mine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That depends . What does she look like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , she's got a beautiful face and long curly red hair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How tall is she ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's fairly tall , maybe 2 inches taller than me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is she chubby ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all . She's actually very athletic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds like she's pretty good-looking . Does she wear glasses ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but she does wear contact lenses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How's her skin ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's got a gorgeous complexion with a few freckles on her nose .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does she have any piercings or tattoos ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think she has her ears pierced and she definitely has a few tattoos
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the tattoo on her foot like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a butterfly - everyone in her family has one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Even her mom ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , even her mom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's her personality like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's a lot like me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So there is something wrong with her ! It was beginning to sound like she was too good to be true !
segments.speaker: S2
